content: this is a basic beret that s a great use for your dk weight handspun or a commercial dk weight yarn two different styles of decreases are shown for a more or less defined style of decrease the pattern notes discuss the pros and cons of yarns having considerable drape versus those with a crisper finish the original idea was to use your own handspun but ravelry doesn t have an option for this on the pattern page so i just called it sara s handspun this is a fun easy knit
